name: Lowpolyamory
description:
Made for the UE4 Winter 2019 game jam.

Gameplay footage: link (YouTube)


Controls:

  • Move with WASD
  • Aim by moving mouse
  • Left Click with a weapon equipped to fire
  • Press E to pick up weapons and flowers, and to give flowers to NPCs
  • Press T to throw away the item you are holding


Gameplay:

Score as many points as you can by picking flowers and giving them to the NPCs you find in the world. The first time you impress an NPC with flowers, they become a new Love Interest, and award you 100 points. As a Love Interest, this NPC will continue generating points — so long as you maintain the relationship. In fact, the longer you maintain a relationship, the faster it generates points!

Though happy at first, eventually Love Interests will feel neglected and demand another gift of flowers. When this happens, be sure to get there with a new gift before time runs out — wait too long, and your former Love Interest will become very unhappy. Like ragingly, murderously unhappy. 

Likewise, be careful of who's around you when you give out flowers. If a Love Interest witnesses you giving flowers to someone else, they will immediately transform into a RAGING MURDEROUS EX.

Raging Murderous Exes will try to kill you with guns. If that's not annoying enough, they also run around and open their blabby mouths about your polyamory, causing your otherwise-happy Love Interests to also freak out and become Raging Murderous Exes themselves. This gossiping can spread like wildfire, and if things get too far out of hand, you might find yourself completely surrounded by your Raging Exes, all armed with guns.

In summary, try to maintain as many happy Love Interest relationships as you can, but don't get caught cheating, and try not to get shot too many times.

Good luck!
